content:
On March 24, the forces of Ukraine's defense were successfully impressed, except for the large landing ships of Yamal and Azov, also the landing ship "Konstantin Olshansky" and the Russian reconnaissance ship "Ivan Hurs".

About thisinformsNavy of the Armed Forces.

As reported by the Armyinform, on March 25, 2024 Dmitry Pletenchuk alsotoldAbout possible damage to the Russian ship Ivan Hurs.

Today is a spokesman for the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine captain of 3 rank Dmitry PletenchukreportedAbout the lesions of the "Neptune" captured by the Russians of the Konstantin Olshansky ship.

We will remind, on March 24, 2024 the General Staff of the Armed Forcesstatedthat the forces of Ukraine's defense successfully impressed the large landing ships of the Russian invaders "Yamal" and "Azov".

GurtoldAbout the details of damage to the landing ship of Russia Yamal.
title: The Navy of the Armed Forces confirmed a successful lesion
description: The Navy informs about it. As reported by the Armyinform, on March 25, 2024 Dmitry ...
